articles.author: Ben Brasch
articles.title: Steve Albini, Nirvana and The Pixies music producer, dies at 61 - The Washington Post
articles.description: Steve Albini, the Chicago alt-rock producer who worked with some of the greatest American rock acts, has died, his studio confirmed.
articles.content:
Steve Albini, a Chicago-based rock producer who allied himself with Nirvana and against the corporatized music industry, has died.
Albini died of a heart attack, according to Taylor Hales, the manag… [+246 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Liptak
articles.title: Biden says he will stop sending bombs and artillery shells to Israel if they launch major invasion of Rafah - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden said for the first time Wednesday he would halt shipments of American weapons to Israel – which he acknowledged have been used to kill civilians in Gaza – if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu orders a major invasion of the city of Rafah.
articles.content:
Programming note: CNNs Erin Burnetts full interview with President Joe Biden airs at 7 p.m. ET on Erin Burnett OutFront
